hanzi-su-wiki:
凹

Значения

Быть вогнутым; сдаваться, подчиняться; впадина

Мнемоника

Вогнутый, комментариев не требуется.
purpleculture_pinyin:
āo
depressed; sunken; indented; concave; female (connector etc)
депрессивный; затонувший; с отступом; вогнутый; розетка (разъем и т. д.)

wā
variant of 洼 ; (used in names)
вариант 洼; (используется в именах)

purpleculture_info:
Ideographic: A rectangle with a hollow
Antonyms: 凸
purpleculture_examples:
凹陷 [ āo xiàn ]: to cave in; hollow; sunken; depressed
凹凸 [ āo tū ]: concave or convex; bumps and holes; uneven (surface); rugged
凹版 [ āo bǎn ]: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
凹镜 [ āo jìng ]: concave mirror
凹凸不平 [ āo tū bù píng ]: uneven (surface); bumpy (road)
贾平凹 [ jiǎ píng wā ]: Jia Pingwa (1952-), Chinese novelist
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
heisig_chinese_memo: Clear image of a concave object
heisig_story: You couldn't have asked for a better key word for this kanji! Just have a look at it: a perfect image of a concave lens (remembering, of course, that the kanji square off rounded things), complete with its own little "cave." Now all you have to do is learn how to write it.
jp_example_words:
凸凹(でこぼこ): unevenness, roughness, ruggedness
凹む(へこむ): be dented, be indented, yield to, to give, sink, collapse, cave in, be snubbed
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The concave radical and the concave kanji are the same!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you call someone concave the 王 (おう) will find out and he'll have his guards turn you concave.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch your mouth around the 王. Have you ever seen a concave person? Yeah that's because they didn't live through it. 王s aren't very nice, you know.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 凹 (へこむ、オウ вогнутость)
Ru_Words:
凹むへこむ
  • вгибаться, оседать, поддаваться (при нажатии)
  • поддаваться, сдаваться, струсить
    • 凸凹でこぼこ
  • неровность (поверхности почвы)
  • неравенство, диспропорция, разрыв, «ножницы»
    • 凹凸おうとつ
  • вогнутость и выпуклость, неровность
Ru_trainchinese:
āo: (прил) вогнутый, вдавленный, впалый
wā: (графема) (диал.) впадина, углубление (вариант 洼)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Clear image of a concave object
humanum_full_description_en:
" Concave " is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols, which only appeared after the Qin and Han Dynasties. (Qiu Xigui) There is no such word in "Shuowen". The original meaning is lower than the surrounding, opposite to " convex ". "Guang Yun. "Qia Yun": "Concave, Xia Ye." Such as "Baopuzi. "Dengshe": "There is a convex copper, and a concave copper also, each engraved with a name." Shu Yuanyu of the Tang Dynasty "E Zhengji": "The soil is big and convex, and the convex is quite dangerous, and the concave is embarrassing. Dip."

"Bump" is often used together to indicate unevenness. For example, in the Yuan Dynasty Hong Xiwen "Shui Tiao Ge Tou": "I want to find a quiet way, but I see the flat and uneven, the charm is full of Qiong." Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty, "Yu Shi Ming Yu. Chen Congshan lost his home in Meiling": "In front of Meiling, looking into Meiling, it is rugged and rough, and it is difficult to walk through the bumps, so I had to go through the ridge and go to Shajiao Town to take office."
humanum_short_description_en: " Concave " is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols. The original meaning is lower than the surrounding, opposite to " convex ".
humanum_full_description:
「凹」是抽象形符造成的表意字，秦漢以後才出現。（裘錫圭）《說文》無此字。本義是低於周圍，與「凸」相對。《廣韻．洽韻》：「凹，下也。」如《抱樸子．登涉》：「有凸起者牡銅也，有凹陷者牝銅也，各刻名識之。」唐代舒元輿〈鄂政記〉：「土勢大凹凸，凸者頗險，凹者瀦浸。」

　　「凹凸」經常連用，表示高低不平。如元代洪希文〈水調歌頭〉：「我欲尋幽無路，但見砌平凹凸，粲粲盡堆瓊。」明代馮夢龍《喻世明語．陳從善梅嶺失渾家》：「前面梅嶺，望進好生嶮峻崎嶇，凹凸難行，只得捱過此嶺，且去沙角鎮上了任。」
humanum_short_description: 「凹」是抽象形符造成的表意字。本義是低於周圍，與「凸」相對。

「 凹 」是抽象形符造成的表意字，秦漢以後才出現。（裘錫圭）《說文》無此字。本義是低於周圍，與「 凸 」相對。《廣韻．洽韻》：「凹，下也。」如《抱樸子．登涉》：「有凸起者牡銅也，有凹陷者牝銅也，各刻名識之。」唐代舒元輿〈鄂政記〉：「土勢大凹凸，凸者頗險，凹者瀦浸。」 「凹凸」經常連用，表示高低不平。如元代洪希文〈水調歌頭〉：「我欲尋幽無路，但見砌平凹凸，粲粲盡堆瓊。」明代馮夢龍《喻世明語．陳從善梅嶺失渾家》：「前面梅嶺，望進好生嶮峻崎嶇，凹凸難行，只得捱過此嶺，且去沙角鎮上了任。」
" Concave" is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols, which only appeared after the Qin and Han Dynasties. (Qiu Xigui) There is no such word in "Shuowen". The original meaning is lower than the surrounding, opposite to " convex". "Guang Yun. "Qia Yun": "Concave, Xia Ye." Such as "Baopuzi. "Dengshe": "There is a convex copper, and a concave copper also, each engraved with a name." Shu Yuanyu of the Tang Dynasty "E Zhengji": "The soil is big and convex, and the convex is quite dangerous, and the concave is embarrassing. Dip." "Bump" is often used together to indicate unevenness. For example, in the Yuan Dynasty Hong Xiwen "Shui Tiao Ge Tou": "I want to find a quiet way, but I see the flat and uneven, the charm is full of Qiong." Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty, "Yu Shi Ming Yu. Chen Congshan lost his home in Meiling": "In front of Meiling, looking into Meiling, it is rugged and rough, and it is difficult to walk through the bumps, so I had to go through the ridge and go to Shajiao Town to take office."

凹字的基本解释

凹
āo
周围高，中间低，与“凸”相对：凹凸不平。凹透镜。凹版印刷（印刷术之一，与“凸版印刷”相反）。
concavefovea,sunken
凸

凹
wā
同“洼”（用于地名）：核桃凹（在中国山西省）。
concavefovea,sunken
凸

凹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［āo］
［《廣韻》烏洽切，入洽，影。］
［《集韻》於交切，平爻，影。］
周围高，中间低。与“凸”相对。
[②]［wā］
［《廣韻》烏洽切，入洽，影。］
同“洼1”。
亦用于地名。山西省有核桃凹。

凹字的英文翻译

◎ 凹
concave, fovea,sunken

凹字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【凵字部】　凹； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页135第10
【唐韻】烏洽切【集韻】【韻會】乙洽切，?音浥。低下也。【東方朔·神異經】大荒石湖，千里無凸凹，平滿無高下。【江淹·靑苔賦】悲凹險兮，惟流水而馳騖。【楊愼·丹鉛錄】土窪曰凹，土高曰凸。古象形字。又【集韻】於交切，音㕭。窊也。

凹字的源字形

凹字的起名意思

周围高，中间低 ，跟"凸"相反。

concave
Basic explanation of words
concave
āo
The surrounding is high and the middle is low, as opposed to "convex": uneven. concave lens. Gravure printing (one of printing, the opposite of "relief printing").
concavefovea,sunken
Convex
concave
wā
Same as "Wa" (used for place names): Walnut Valley (in Shanxi Province, China).
concavefovea,sunken
Convex
concave
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [āo]
["Guang Yun" Wu Qiaqi, enter Qia, shadow. ]
["Ji Yun" in cross cutting, flat line, shadow. ]
High around, low in the middle. Contrast with "convex".
[②]［wā］
["Guang Yun" Wu Qiaqi, enter Qia, shadow. ]
Same as "Wa 1".
Also used for place names. There is a walnut recess in Shanxi Province.
concave

concave, fovea,sunken
concave
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Ji Zi Department] 　 Concave; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 135 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Wu Qiaqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yi Qiaqie,? Sound. Low also. [Dongfang Shuo·Sutra of Miracles] The great barren stone lake has no unevenness for thousands of miles, and it is flat and flat. 【Jiangyan·Tian Moss Fu】Sorrowful and dangerous, but galloping with the flowing water. [Yang Ming·Danqian Lu] The soil is said to be concave, and the soil is high to be convex. Ancient hieroglyphs. Also 【Ji Yun】in cross cutting, sound 㕭. Yeah.
concave
Source glyph
concave
Name meaning
The surrounding is high and the middle is low, which is the opposite of "convex".
四
象形字。像物体中间凹下去的样子。凹指四周高、中间低。
Oao 低于周围,与“凸”相对:~地|~凸不平。Owa 同
“洼”,用于地名:核桃~(在山西省)。

четыре
Пиктограммы.
Это похоже на углубление в середине объекта.
Вогнутый означает высокий вокруг и низкий посередине.
Оао находится ниже окружения, в отличие от «выпуклого»: ~ земля | ~ неровная.
Ова - это то же самое, что и «Ва», используемое для географических названий: Грецкий орех ~ (в провинции Шаньси).
